title: 004-Iron_Man_PAL_Wii-crosby
description:
The epic, action-packed Marvel Studios production Iron Man will be directed by John Favreau and stars Robert Downey Jr., Jeff Bridges, Terrance Howard and Gwyneth Paltrow. The Iron Man third-person action game will immerse Iron Man players in explosive militaristic combat from the film with loads of additional content created exclusively for the interactive Iron Man experience!

Iron Man Features:


A DEVASTATING WEAPON: Iron Man alone battles armies of fighter jets, military tanks, armored Super Villains and more. 
POWER CONTROL: Iron Man players will direct power to different parts of Iron Man&#039;s suit, creating a variety of unique attacks. 
CHAOTIC BATTLEFIELDS: Iron Man&#039;s open-ended battlefields create adrenaline packed combat filled with unpredictable challenges. 
BEYOND THE IRON MAN MOVIE:: Iron Man the game includes additional plotlines and characters from the Iron Man Comic Universe that are not featured in the Iron Man movie. 
OPEN WORLD: Iron Man players have complete freedom to move anywhere in the environment and make seamless transitions between ground combat and open air flight.
